title: Low Grade Hoblitzell Needed to Finish Set
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Low Grade Hoblitzell Needed to Finish Set
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt E.
My son Turner and I are almost finished with our T205 Master Set.
Just missing a couple commons in grades SGC 40-60. Those are no big deal to find.

However, the Hoblitzell No Stats still eludes us. We are considering using the best card in our set to help us finish what has been a fun and educational journey. 

Obviously a low grade Hoblitzell would be fine. Testing the waters for the right deal. 


Thanks,

Matt and Turner


[URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/4908/scan0011kz4.jpg[/IMG][/URL]<br

Matt & Turner - congratulations!  It's been enjoyable watching you guys put the set together!

Sorry, I will update the listing but my Hoblitzell NS has been sold.

That card is extremely difficult and even a beater should run 6k, good luck to you Matt in polishing off the set.
